solution_line_template: {total_passengers} passengers / {total_buses} buses = <<{total_passengers}/{total_buses}={passengers_per_bus}>>{passengers_per_bus} passengers fit in one bus.
{passengers_per_bus} passengers/bus * {target_buses} buses = <<{passengers_per_bus}*{target_buses}={passengers_in_target_buses}>>{passengers_in_target_buses} passengers fit in 5 buses.
